info.label: Software Engineer
info.brief: UCL Theoretical Physics graduate (First Class Honors); Self taught intermediate programmer (Python, Mathematica); Freelance Web Developer
info.quote: Be the change you want to see in the world.

projects.title: chat.hayk.io
projects.summary: Flask & SocketIO based webapp that connects with a Slack workspace and carries messages between the two (Hayk (owner) talks from Slack, user talks from webapp).

projects.title: Can Hot Water Freeze Faster Than Cold Water?
projects.summary: A university research project tasked with investigating the effects of impurities and differing starting temperatures on the freezing of water.
highlights: Designed multiple molecular dynamics simulations in LAMMPS investigating the effects of impurities on the freezing of water.
Analyzed the data, comparing to data gathered by the experimental team.
Visualized our results using VMD and Jupyter.
Assembled our research in LaTeX.
Transcribed minutes for some meetings.
Chaired some meetings.

projects.title: Intergrated Engineering Challenge #2: Global Health
projects.summary: A university project where a a multi-disciplinary team of specialist engineers  formulate, design and verify an effective strategy for the production and distribution (and monitoring) of a vaccine to combat a Tuberculosis Pandemic in Sub Saharan Africa.
highlights: Designed and developed a control system for the temperature, pH, and stirring of a bio-reactor.
Developed in C and Processing on a Launchpad microprocessor.
Liaised with engineers from other disciplines on specifications and requirements.

history.summary: Designed and developed a quantum computer simulator in C++. Lectured on quantum computation.
Developed full stack, responsive websites for my clients.
highlights: JekyllNow, Wordpress
Bootstrap, Polymer
LAMP stacks

history.summary: Provided excellent bar service and guest satisfaction in high-volume, fast-paced bar.
highlights: Utilized knowledge of mixed beverages, specialty liquors and craft beers to serve customers and provide wait staff with well prepared drinks in a timely fashion.
Stocked and tracked inventory and supplies.
Maintained a clean and organized work area.
Followed safety, sanitation and legal policies for handling food and beverages.
Developed excellent customer relations.
Prepared orders in fast-paced environment.

history.summary: Addressed clients' issues with their finances and resolved their concerns with investments. Improved my communication skills through the high pressure environment of finance sales.
Launched  social media presences and designed advertising campaigns that increased my clients' following by over 60%.
Diagnosed and troubleshooted networking and technical issues at the IT department of an office of 50 employees.
Repaired and serviced ATVs, jetskis, and snowmobiles at the mechanical department of the BRP Service Center.

history.title: Theoretical Physics BSc
history.summary: Achieved a degree with First Class Honors
highlights: Practical Mathematics and Computing I & II (Python and Mathematica): 84% & 86%
Mathematical Methods II & III: 91% & 91%
Climate & Energy: 83%
Representative for 30 Physics students

history.summary: Helped raise €5365 over two charity events (October - December 2014)
highlights: Social media management
Graphic design

speaking.title: Delegate of Iran
speaking.summary: A simulation of the United Nations, done by students from various schools as they discuss and try to find solutions to current world problems.
highlights: Debated and discussed issues in a formal UN-like setting.
Created resolutions to be debated.

speaking.title: Member of Medical Ethics committee
speaking.summary: An annual weekend conference where young people between the ages of 15-19 from schools convene to discuss and express themselves on current affairs.
highlights: Debated and discussed various ethical issues in the medical field.

speaking.title: Speaker
highlights: Gave a speech on how no particles ever really touch as a consequence of the electromagnetic force.
